ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:07:13 urn:comixology:881155 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-09 01:15:07. [Issue ID 786283]
ComicInfo.Summary: Need to save your summer from ruin by a villainous virus? MAD’s superhero-themed issue to the rescue! We lampoon your favorite caped characters in all-new features, including favorites like, “Snappy Answers to Superhero Questions,” “Spy vs. Spy,” and Sergio Aragonés’ “Shadow Knows.” And we’re reprinting beloved MAD classics like “Bat Boy and Rubin” from way back in 1953! It’s an issue that’s sure to leave you shouting, “Holy blecch, Batman!”
ComicInfo.Title: Super SpooferHeroes Issue
